docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.text: class ClassDoc A dataclass for containing class-meta. Methods: Name Description Returns append_method None None __str__ Generate markdown documentation from class meta-data. str __str__() Generate markdown documentation from class meta-data. class Doc Methods: Name Description Returns append_class None None append_function None None compile None None --- class DocVisitor Methods: Name Description Returns visit_Module None None visit_FunctionDef None None visit_ClassDef None None grab_doc Grabs the documentation from given AST node. str grab_doc(node: Node) Grabs the documentation from given AST node. Parameters: Name Type Description Default node Node The given Python AST node to check and grab doc-string from. is required param_table_from() None function_to_markdown() None decorator_names() None grab_id() None __init__() None append_method() None __str__() Generate markdown documentation from class meta-data. append_class() None append_function() None compile() None visit_Module() None visit_FunctionDef() None visit_ClassDef() None grab_doc(node: Node) Grabs the documentation from given AST node. Parameters: Name Type Description Default node Node The given Python AST node to check and grab doc-string from. is required handle_docs(path: str) Extracts all docstrings from a given Python source file. Parameters: Name Type Description Default path str The path of given Python file. is required section() None
